column2: A gendarmerie is a military force with law enforcement duties among the civilian population.

We have become the masters of our political destiny, the power of the monarchy has been ceded to the parliament and chancellor, and by extension to ourselves. Now we have within our grasp the ability to finish the job peacefully, and to make We The People the formal basis of our sovereignty!
It is not enough to have empty lands, all Mexicans are Americans! §YNOTE: Not an option once the civil war starts.§!
Whilst we have made excellent progress regardless of our cultures, some are still left out. It is time to bring them as full citizens into the Federation.
They have their sphere, we have ours
Discussions are ongoing in our new republic as to how centeralised we should be:
The recent proliferation of conttraception amoung out populace is having a negative effect on our growth rate.
Prophylactics and the like are become widespread in the population, reducing the fertility rate.
Women are increasingly being employed in greater numbers, upsetting the more traditional order of family life. Decreasing stay at home wifes results in a reduced interest in having children.
As traditional early marriages become less common, the window for having children is reduced, decreasing the birthrate.
Prior to the 19th century, humorism (also known as humoralism) was thought to explain the cause of disease.
The advent of electricity and on the clock shifts can be applied to our mines fields to increase the resource turnover.
We can now seize effective control over the industrial production of our great nation. The people will be less likely to question the legitimate rule of our Supreme Leader when their needs are met.
With the collapse of the previous fascist regime, it is time to also force the collapse of the cartels that helped sustain it.
With the advent of new work oppertunities given by our Supreme Leader, let us force the undesirables to earn their keep in our great nation!
Not now, let us bide out time.

Our rapid growth has alarmed the other great powers. We can now make a promise to them and the international community that we seek no more significant expansion for the next 10 years. We may only make this promise once.
We have promised that for the next 10 years, we will not undertake any siginifant expansion.
Living conditions are starting to increase and infant mortality is dropping, this is having a noticeable effect on our population growth.
We look forward to continued improvements
Long have the Mongolian lands to the north been considered part of China, but they have broken away in the chaos. Now we shall restore them to China!

Long has the military controlled the government, but now they are reluctantly willing to surrender up the majority of their power to the civiliian administration. This is a new dawn for a free and prosperous China!
Remove decisions clutter by hiding the general, management, and MP options.
Show decisions that allow general, management, or MP options.
Take this decision to enable transfer CBs to be justified on our nation, for us to recieve land transfers, and for us to justify them on others.
Take this decision to enable transfer CBs to be justified on our nation, for us to recieve land transfers, and for us to justify them on others.
Take this decions to prevent transfer CBs being justified on our nation, for us to not recieve land transfers, and to prevent us justifying on others.

Take this decions to prevent transfer CBs being justified on our nation (and to prevent us justifying them on other nations).§Y RP FROM CONQUEST DEBUFF IS CURRENTLY ACTIVE§R Cannot use whilst either is at war.§!
Socialists want to see the enactment of further political and social reforms.
Liberals want to enact some political reforms, but will also support greater political reform and social reform under conditions of high militancy.
As the loser of the war we have been forced to lower our tarrifs for 5 years.
We have lost the war and been forced to lower our tarrifs as a result
We have been forced into a humiliating treaty that imposes foreign control over our trade tarrifs. We will regain control, prestige be damned!
Establishing good terms with our Portugese breatheren we have opened up for the possibility to unite our peninsula into one Union. Let us seize this oppertunity!
Now we have united our peoples, we should also seek to treat the Portuguese as full citizens and equals.
We should reconcile our differences with the Basque people and integrate them as full members in our nation. They are our Iberian brothers!
Our government has managed to convince the populace that we have the right to war for any reason, although the international community is not convinved. Must have jingoism to use this cb.
Times have changed, we no longer seek to justify our right to war to our populace.
The ideals we have in common, the values we share. These allow us to work together like no other government can. The constitution is our instrument, the instrument of We The People.
Our great Republic has fallen. What once held us together does no longer. Maybe those days will return, but for now they are lost.

The Federation seeks to treat all who live in it as equal citizens. We are one Republic. The Mongos have accepted their membership of the federation, and in turn we should accept them. Birth or culture should stop a Mongolian from being the President!

The Federation seeks to treat all who live in it as equal citizens. We are one Republic. The Tibetans have accepted their membership of the federation, and in turn we should accept them. Birth or culture should stop a Tibetan from being the President!
Uighur Reconciliation & To a United China at last

The Uighur's are a core part of China, their religion is as Chinese as any other. Together we prosper, the Uighurs shall be full citizens. China is reborn as we move into the new era a united and free people.

Korea has always been our brother. We have shared history, although our language and cultures diverge. That does not mean our politics must though, and Korean citizens have noticed the advancements in our Federation. While protests occur in Korea, a group of influential Korean political leaders have approached the President asking for Korea to be admitted to the Federation, by force if frustrated by foreign powers. Japan and Russia would be angered by this move, but can we really abandon our Korean brothers crying out for liberty?
Vietnam was once a part of the Chinese Dynasties of old, and now that they are a part of the Federation they are citizens of the new Chinese Republic. Let us treat them as such.
Living conditions are greatly increasing and infant mortality plummeting, this is having a large effect on our population growth.
Now that we accept the people of India, perhaps it is time to become one Union with them. Together we rise, free from overseas rule!
Free at last, we must seek to strengthen our democracy. It is vital to developing our national consciousness.
We share much in common with the tibetan people, let us realise that fact and add them to our Union.
Long on out northern border, nepal has not always been seen as a full part of India. Let us finally integrate them into the Union.
Now that Tibet is a state in the Union, their citizens shall be treated as such as well.

The President has the ability to issue executive orders, but the legislature will be outraged if the President consistently bypasses them. Hence this power can only be used a limited number of times per term. NOTE: This ability is active for on average 2 months.
The time for executive decree has passed.
The executive system and separation of powers (or lack of) must be decided on in our Constitution.
Our leader and inner circle have no practical restraints on their power from the constitution.
The parliament is gaining power at the expense of the monarchy, our system of government is changing.
Advances in our nations education and research allow the government to increase funding for research projects, and put more political focus into R&D.
Advances in our nations education and research allow the government to increase funding for research projects, and put more political focus into R&D.
Advances in our nations education and research allow the government to increase funding for research projects, and put more political focus into R&D.
Strongly encourage immigrants to choose us as their destination, this is accomplished via a heavy propaganda campaign, and finanacial incentives such as a free journey.
End the ongoing campaign to increase the number of immigrants to our lands.
We can select the level of campaign we desire, or none at all.
We are encouraging emmigrants to choose us as their destination.
We are strongly encouraging emmigrants to choose us as their destination.
We have recently started an immigration campaign and cannot cancel its effects for a while.
We are experiencing a delcine in the overall birth rate, no doubt encouraged by the low infant mortality and changing economy.
Hungary has many Germans and German brother cultured-people residing in it. We must ensure it is made a full part of the new Reich!
Restore south German control over Venice.
We will begin a campaign to encourage German culture with german classes for non-german speakers, german festivals, and integration of locals into german politics.
We are carrying out campaigns to promote our culture
Victor Hugo & the Oak of the USE
On 14 July 1870 Hugo planted the "oak of the United States of Europe" in the garden of Hauteville House where he stayed during his exile on Guernsey from 1856 to 1870.
When all nations on our continent will form a European brotherhood. A day will come when we shall see the United States of America and the United States of Europe face to face,
We are more unified, and willing to stand together.
We are experiencing a massive rise in European solidarity.
We are experiencing a massive rise in European solidarity, people are feeling more European than ever before!
We are rapidly catching up and advancing our scientifc and technological understanding
The People of the Niger River United
We must seek to unify ourselves so that we can stand strong in this new world.
We have estabilished control over the east of our nation, let us now integrate the people of our new federation.
We have estabilished control over the center of our nation, let us now integrate the people of our new federation.
We have estabilished control over the west of our nation, let us now integrate the people of our new federation.
We control these lands and can accept their people into the federation as equals.
Kongo is under federal control, their people will be granted federation citizenship.
Our new medicical knowledge and technology is reapidly decreasing the infant mortality rate, resulting in a population boom.

A barrage is massed sustained artillery fire aimed at a series of points along a line. As well as attacking any enemy in that line, a barrage intends to suppress enemy movement and actions through that line.
Our relationship with the Walloon people has always been close, although fraught with tension. It is time we set aside our quarrels and work together on the major challenges facing us, as one.
We must wait for our negotating team to return
We must wait for our diplomatic mission to return
We are in need of diplomatic aid, let us ask our ally for their public support and stated justifcation on the matter. NOTE: Nations with more than 25 infamy will not recieve the request.
We will consider the use of our diplomatic abilities to justify the expansions of our allies.
We will not allow our diplomats to waste their time justifiying the conquests of others.
We will not recieve any trade deal offers.
We will recieve trade deal offers.
Basic jobseekers allowances are provided by a government agency.
Standard jobseekers allowances are provided by a government agency.

The government provides a small monthly income to all citizens, regardless of their economic situation. This income is guarantteed and paid from the government budget. \n§YMust have admin spending at 75%+ to gain the full effects.\n§RThis reform will be rescinded if a non socialist/communist government is in power!§!

A large sum of money is provided to each citizen monthly. This is an unconditional payment and funded by the government budget. \n§YMust have admin spending at 100% to gain the full effects.\n§RThis reform will be rescinded if a non socialist/communist government is in power!§!
The party of large tax and large spend is no longer in power, we will now readjust our social spending levels.
We have long been under control from London, and since they seem unwilling to decide our long term future we should seize the oppertunity ourselves to make this choice.
Active as can currently take land from civs as an unciv.
Our president is a monarchist, and whilst he has agreed to the status quo, we could take the initiative and request for a prince of spanish decent to take our throne.
No. The status quo suits us well. We will not suffer the rule of a Spanish king once more.
Yes. Let us reach out to Spain and get oursleves a new King!

We can relax our laws regarding immigration from the colonies, this will provide us with more workers and future citizens, althouth the more conservative and reactionary elements of our nation will not be happy. NOTE: This allows migration from colonies to states, limited to half the base rate of migration. This modifier will be removed if the conditions required to take it are no longer met.
The government has deemed it appropriate to restrict immigration from the colonies. Colonial pops will not migrate to states.
An aircraft carrier is a warship that serves as a seagoing airbase, equipped with a full-length flight deck and facilities for carrying, arming, deploying, and recovering aircraft.

Mountain ranges are of strategic importance since they often act as a natural border, and may also be the origin of a water source. Attacking a prepared enemy position in mountain terrain requires a greater ratio of attacking soldiers to defending soldiers than a war conducted on level ground.
Prevent bankruptcy events from appearing. (Can re-enable)
Due to our influence over Tibet we can now free them from the clasp of the Qing, although this will reinforce Chinese claims to the region and anger the British who may respond.
Russia has snaked its way into the government of Tibet, we cannot allow this to stand! Force of arms will be considered.

The world is entering a new era: new politcs, new industry, new weapons of war, and new Unions. Notable Union tags: Germany, United States of America, United States of Europe, Union of South American Republics, Niger Federation, Chinese Federal Republic, Indian Union, Arab Union, and Coptic Empire/Efircan Federation.
Choosing multiplayer will allow the multiplayer only decisions and events
Hide all the decisions that allow army stack creation. NOTE: To use the built armies, group the new units together and they will function as usual.
Show all the decisions that allow army stack creation. NOTE: To use the built armies, group the new units together and they will function as usual.
Construct an army of 4 infantry, 1 hussar, and 5 artillery in the capital. Will consume the same amount of goods as if built manually.
Construct an army of 1 hussar and 5 artillery in the capital. Will consume the same amount of goods as if built manually.
Construct an army of 1 plane and 4 artillery in the capital. Will consume the same amount of goods as if built manually.
Our hegemony over the Oceanic region allows us to establish the new Oceanic Union. We will prosper together!
We have been granted Dominion status by the British, and now we are permitted to go the full way and establish our own Republic.
Situated just to our north the empty lands in the East of New Guinea can be claimed by our government as our rightful domain.
Although Java is already claimed by others, that does not stop us asserting our rightful control over the Island. They are part of Oceania like us.
To ensure our areas of economic and military power projection, we must have control over the surrounding islands and chains.
Acceptance of the New Guinea People
One of our earliest colonies, they should be citizens like the rest, not subjects.
The people of the islands are recognized with full civic rights like mainlanders.
Our largest and most prosperous colony, let them be citzens of Oceania, any Javanese could be the Presdident!
We are in a dominant position to found the Celtic Union, where we unite the disparate brother groups of our culture into one whole!
Long has Wales suffered under foreign rule, we will seek to free them of this great injustice and welcome them into our Union.x
Across the Channel, our Breton brothers seek cultural autonomy that the French cannot provide. We shall provide it.
Free the people of Galicia! Let them live in peace!

India used to be the manufacturing heart of the world, but colonial exploitation has destroyed our manufacturing base. We must seek to use our rich deposits of iron ore for our new industrialising economy.
Like with iron, coal is needed for a strong manufacturing base and to recover our economy from decades of colonial exploitation. Let us strike the earth for new veins of coal!
We have unified out Coptic lands, with our new domain we may now proclaim the reborn Coptic Empire!
We demand a route back to the Coptic Orthodox Church of Alexandria and our fellow breatheren in the region. We now demand Sudan!
Since the people of these regions are under our rule and have learned to accept our government, it is time we accept them in turn.
The Federal Republic guarantees rights to all, afforded by our Constitution. All of the people within our borders are citizens in same!

Two factions within our new nation are pulling at the government, demanding we expand either to the north coast (Myaphisite Faction) or to the southern lakes (Representative Faction). We could reaffirm our status as the Gods Empire on Earth, or move away from a religious justification of unity to one more republican and anti-colonial in nature. We must decide which factions ideas to follow:
To the North Coast and the Church of Alexandria!
To the Southern Lakes of East Africa!
We will not abandon our roots so easily

We have reclaimed our birthright and Copts are in control of the Church of Alexandria once more. A large number of Sunni muslims now live inside our borders, should we seek to convert them to our christian ways, or leave them be?
They will know the way of God
It is not for us to show their way to God
We must strike the earth to take advantage of our natural resources, many of which can be used in our flourishing new industrial economy.
Remove the AIs preference for historical colonising
Set the mp_setup global flag to unlock features excelusive to mp, and block op sp effects.
Take this decision to premptively decide if the UK is allowed isolationism. Pax Britannica UK decision turns on isolationism
We must strike the earth to take advantage of our natural resources, many of which can be used in our flourishing new industrial economy.
A submarine (or sub) is a watercraft capable of independent operation underwater.

The submarine became a potentially viable weapon with the development of the Whitehead torpedo, designed in 1866 by British engineer Robert Whitehead, the first practical self-propelled or 'locomotive' torpedo. The spar torpedo that had been developed earlier by the Confederate States Navy was considered to be impracticable, as it was believed to have sunk both its intended target, and probably H. L. Hunley, the submarine that deployed it.
An aircraft carrier is a warship that serves as a seagoing airbase, equipped with a full-length flight deck and facilities for carrying, arming, deploying, and recovering aircraft.
The first time military submarines had significant impact on a war was in World War I. Forces such as the U-boats of Germany operated against Allied commerce (Handelskrieg)
column3: the submarine's ability to function as a practical war machine relied on new tactics, their numbers, and submarine technologies such as combination diesel/electric power system that had been developed in the preceding years.

column2: As a result of the Washington Naval Treaty of 1922, which limited the construction of new heavy surface combat ships, most early aircraft carriers were conversions of ships that were laid down (or had served) as different ship types: cargo ships, cruisers, battlecruisers, or battleships.
Specialist carrier evolution was well underway in the 1920s, with several navies ordering and building warships that were purposefully designed to function as aircraft carriers by the mid-1920s.

QE is a monetary policy whereby a central bank purchases at scale government bonds or other financial assets in order to inject money into the economy to expand economic activity. Quantitative easing is considered to be an "unconventional" form of monetary policy, which is usually used when inflation is very low or negative, and when standard monetary policy instruments have become ineffective.

In a unitary system the only level of government besides the central is the local or municipal government. Within a federal system the state or provincial governments share sovereignty with the central government and have final jurisdiction over a broad range of policy areas. Empire / Republic wide powers can be devolved to the provines / states.

We can seek to expand our domain into manchuria, accomplishing a dream of many Russians to straddle Eurasia. We must now decide whether to push fully for this, or whether to stick to outer Manchuria, or Priamurye, as it shall be known. If we demand all of Manchuria, we will also be able to annex Mongolia (if we puppet it, in the future).
Yes, we shall have it all
Enraged by demands on Manchuria, many more people of China will accept neccesary reforms, and even push full heartedly for them
As we carry on the path of Zheltorossiya, we will fully integrate our Mongolian puppet. Their people we be best served under our administration.

column6: El Poder marítimo y la Marina Mercante
Escuelas de negocios y magnates del Capitalismo

column2: New cranes and tools to assist with construction and maintenance of ships allows more to be maintaned with the same shipyard crew
With the arrival of a new marxist government, UBI is back on the table for the upperhouse to consider.
We will share the fruits of our labour amoungst us all
We have built large surplus barracks and supply storage for our incoming mobilised armies to be organised and sent to the front.

Our country is under intellectual assault by modernity and the Western World. In the fields of modern technology, industry and military theory, the old traditions and institutions no longer serve us as they used to. Everywhere we turn, western influences spread like wildfire through our nation, our population, and our souls. If we are to remain what we always have been, and not become something else entirely, now is the time to assume control of our own destiny. It has become apparent to the leading members of our intellectual elite, that the only way to turn the tide on the Western Leviathan is to swim with it, for, as Sun Tzu says: The reed that bends before the wind, also offers a form of resistance. §YReload the save (after techs have been returned via events post westernisaion) to reactivate inventions§!
Greece became independent from our Sultan in 1821, and never have we been able to re-establish control and undo the final borders imposed on us by the 1832 Conference of London. Now we shall.

The Regency of Algiers was a state in North Africa lasting from 1516 to 1830, when it was conquered by the French. It had been semi-autonomous from 1710 due to the coup of Baba Ali Chaouche. We will now reassert our longstanding claims to Algeria.
After our victories over the European powers we can now formally annex Algeria under the Porte's control, although some local forces may resist once more.
With our control over Crimea secured once more, let us embrace our fellow islamic bretheren of the peninsula.

We are now sufficently advanced for the European barbarians to regard us as "Civilised", and so they must respect our right to centralise and reject foreign influence throughout China. §YReload the save (after techs have been returned via events post westernisaion) to reactivate inventions§!

In light of the French annexation of Indochina, and our historic links with Vietam and the people of the region, we have deemed it appropriate to formally integrate Heiqi Jun into the Empire. This will protect them, and ensure our southern border.
Prevent any crises from occuring this campaign.
Although we are free of our colonial overlords, our lands and people are foreverchanged. We must work with what we've got to build a brighter future.
The Ottoman Empire is dead, and so are the claims that went with it. We shall focus on building a Turkish Republic, free from foreign domination.

Egypt under Muhammad Ali in the early 19th century had the fifth most productive cotton industry in the world, in terms of the number of spindles per capita. The industry was initially driven by machinery that relied on traditional energy sources, such as animal power, water wheels, and windmills, which were also the principal energy sources in Western Europe up until around 1870. It was under Muhammad Ali in the early 19th century that steam engines were introduced to the Egyptian cotton industry.
Shipbuilding has always been a ‘boom and bust’ industry, and the years between the wars were more bust than boom.

Bronze is an alloy consisting primarily of copper, commonly with about 12–12.5% tin and often with the addition of other metals (such as aluminium, manganese, nickel or zinc) and sometimes non-metals or metalloids such as arsenic, phosphorus or silicon. These additions produce a range of alloys that may be harder than copper alone, or have other useful properties, such as strength, ductility, or machinability.

The shoemaking trade flourished in the eighteenth and early nineteenth centuries but began to be affected by industrialization in the later nineteenth century. Traditional handicraft shoemaking has now been largely superseded in volume of shoes produced by industrial mass production of footwear, but not necessarily in quality, attention to detail, or craftsmanship.

Pharmacuetical manufacturing is the process of industrial-scale synthesis of pharmaceutical drugs as part of the pharmaceutical industry. The process of drug manufacturing can be broken down into a series of unit operations, such as milling, granulation, coating, tablet pressing, and others.

Bronze, or bronze-like alloys and mixtures, were used for coins over a longer period. Bronze was especially suitable for use in boat and ship fittings prior to the wide employment of stainless steel owing to its combination of toughness and resistance to salt water corrosion. Bronze is still commonly used in ship propellers and submerged bearings.

Until the 19th century, shoemaking was a traditional handicraft, but by the century's end, the process had been almost completely mechanized, with production occurring in large factories. Despite the obvious economic gains of mass-production, the factory system produced shoes without the individual differentiation that the traditional shoemaker was able to provide.

During World War One, many ships sank, so after the war there were a few years when there was high demand for building new ships. However, by the mid 1920s, enough ships had been built to meet demand. This was partly a result of the peace terms, under which Germany was expected to build ships to be distributed among the Allies.

In the pharmaceutical industry, a wide range of excipients may be blended together with the active pharmaceutical ingredient to create the final blend used to manufacture the solid dosage form. The range of materials that may be blended, presents a number of variables which must be addressed to achieve target product quality attributes.
Remove the supply increase in the capital for AI nations
Remove the supply increase in the former capital
Advancements in technology allow us to mine previous unobtainable goods, bolstering supply for our industrial base.
Advancements in technology allow us to mine previous unobtainable goods, bolstering supply for our industrial base.
Advancements in technology allow us to mine previous unobtainable goods, bolstering supply for our industrial base.
Advancements in technology allow us to mine previous unobtainable goods, bolstering supply for our industrial base.
Advancements in technology allow us to mine previous unobtainable goods, bolstering supply for our industrial base.
We must decide who will lead our new Italian ally.
The government of New England, with the consent of its legislature, has requested unification with Canada. In return they ask for equal standing as full citizens. How shall we respond?
No, we seek to return to our homeland
We have lost. The Chartists are victorious and so we shall look across the seas, the shores and lands of Canada shall be our home. Maybe one day we will return, maybe not.
It is time to make ourselves and our governmnet more reflective of the new political reality, we will forge ourselves anew!
We must work with the french speakers of our land, and take Hudson Bay Company land under Crown control
We request, no we DEMAND the freedom of the people of New England. We will go to Washington and enforce our demands like its 1812.
Since integration of the New Englanders and acceptance of their culture, we can now assert control over these lands, and future rightful control, to the international community.
After our victory over the republicans, we can proclaim once more the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland.

With the reorganisation into the Republic, we will now set out the ideals and character of our nation in the new constitution and subsequent laws. We are restricted by the views of our citizens, and technology. How shall we focus ourselves? 

 §YLiberty:§! 35 liberals in upper house / 20 liberal & 15 socialist / NV liberty. 
 §REquality:§! 35 socialist in the upper house / 20 socialist & 15 liberal / NV socialist §G
 Order:§! Always available 
 §BProductivity:§! All 1836 commerce techs / NV productivity §!
Mexico has refused to repay debts owed to us, we can use this pretext (and whilst the USA is preoccupied with the Civil War) to invade an make a client out of Mexico.
Yes, we shall install Maximilian I as Emperor
No, Franco-American relations would suffer too greatly
We are attacked once more! Our second indpendence war is apon us! We must try to call on aid from the United States. As preoccupied as they are, it is our only hope for aid.
Let us hope the Americans respond kindly in turn.
No, we will not call on outside aid and intervention, this is our fight
European imperialism is back in the Americas, France seeks to impose their monarchichal ways on Mexico and control it once more, how shall we respond?
We shall aid the Mexican Republic

We can begin a mass education campaign to target the most illiterate citizens and raise their literacy. It will cost administrative effort, and other nations will be wary of the fast rise in the ability of populace.

We have complied a list of areas most in need of targeted education to increase our literacy. Lower literacy citizens will gain more effect from the campaign, with higher literacy citizens seeing little to no effect, shall we proceed?
Yes, our people must have the oppertunity education affords them
No, the literacy of our populace is now sufficent
There is currently a nationwide effort to educate the most needing of our populace.
They aren't needed in MP setup
Remove specifically European culture pops (they are used as feeder pops for other pops to assimilate to when the USE exists).
A bomber is a combat aircraft designed to attack ground and naval targets by dropping air-to-ground weaponry (such as bombs), launching torpedoes, or deploying air-launched cruise missiles.
Westernise the slow ai countries - cleanup
Prevent CB justification on the World Bank
Canada and Australia are released as puppets to pick at the start. The UK can then go on to release them from puppet status via generic release vassal decision if they so want to.
The total §Ysupply throughput§! of all our §Ynaval ports§! will always be sufficient for any navy we maintain.
The core of our nation stems from the initial French landings in Quebec, whilst the English Canadians are a key part of our nation, it is the French Canadians that laid its foundations.
Now Haiti is under our control we should reconcile with the inhabitants of the island, led by our common language.
We have established control over the indochinese region and can now proclaim a new union!
We must work with the people of our lands, so that we prosper together.
We must shorten our border to the west, let us claim the lands to the Bankok border to secure our western flank.
We will formally request at the British Embassy for all our lands to be returned unto us.

The government of Canada has formally requested of us to hand over our directly administered territories in the north of the Americas. They are far better situated to administer it, and in light of our alliance we should consider this request seriously.
Home of the Great Church of Antioch
Egypt is our right to claim, we will establish Coptic control over it once more!
New doctrines of concentrated armies and firepower to punch breaks in enemy lines are being theorised and tested.
New doctrines of concentrated armies and firepower to punch breaks in enemy lines are being theorised and tested.
A professional army is composed of full-time soldiers who may be either career soldiers or conscripts. They are of higher quality, but require longer to train effectively
In order to use our increasing advanced weaponry and to learn the tacits of the day, training times must be increased.
Radicals want to enact further political reforms, and have a low support for social reform but will become more supportive under conditions of intermediate militancy.
Radicals will seek to found a Republic if successful. They will advance all political reforms they can, and are supportive of some social reforms.
Anarchists will advance all social and political reforms, and will revoke none.
Anarchists want the people free of state corceion, and for all to realise the value of their labour. They will seek to advance politial and social reforms.

In the interests of the workers, a serious of confederated communes have been founded across the nation, combining local direct democracy and the principles of free assosication. Resources will be shared as agreed upon, and all workers will enjoy the value of their labour.

Due to our dominance across the strait, we can exact a toll on any foreign ships that pass through the waters. Doing so will increase our income and prestige, but give just cause for war to the affected nations.
The outrage caused by our actions has caused a national security risk. To make ammends we will remove our tolls on ships passing through the strait.

Outrageous! We must now submit to the taxation of our goods transported through the Mediterranean Strait. We can seek to rectify the situation via war, and force the offending nation to back down from their tolls permanently.
We will not stand for this affront
Since we no longer control key land on either side of the strait, we have been forced to effectively rescind our taxation of goods passing through.

Through either war or diplomacy (or mayhaps both), the nation that so outrageously taxed our goods passing through the Mediterranean strait has been forced to revoke their charges permanently. Our merchants shall rejoice.
We tax the goods passing through the strait, boosting our coffers and prestige
We are being taxed on the value of our goods passing through the strait. This harms our traders and prestige.
During the 70 day trial period our domestic focus can be removed, beyond that it can't.
Can remove Domestic Focus modifier during the first 70 days

Instutions take time to have change affected in them, and the policies of the parties in power is what initiates these gradual shifts. Jingoism is locked to the two highest levels, pro-military to the top three, anti-military to the bottom three, and pacifism to the bottom two. While Germany was not united until the proclamation of the German Empire, following the Franco-Prussian war, rising nationalism in the 19th century had meant that unification had been on the cards long before that, with the Frankfurt assembly of 1848 being an important forerunner. Count Friedrich Ferdinand von Beust was a German and Austrian statesman. As an opponent of Otto von Bismarck, he attempted to conclude a common policy of the German middle states between Austria and Prussia.
Count Friedrich Ferdinand von Beust was a German and Austrian statesman.

The California Gold Rush (1848–1855) was a gold rush that began on January 24, 1848, when gold was found by James W. Marshall at Sutter's Mill in Coloma, California. The news of gold brought approximately 300,000 people to California from the rest of the United States and abroad. The sudden influx of gold into the money supply reinvigorated the American economy, and the sudden population increase allowed California to go rapidly to statehood, in the Compromise of 1850. The Gold Rush had severe effects on Native Californians and accelerated the Native American population's decline from disease, starvation and the California genocide. The population of the state grew faster than any other state in the US at its peak.
The population of the state is growing rapidly due to immigration from across the USA and the world
With the collapse of the Republic, the immigration wave that California once experienced is no more.
California's golden days are behind it

The FRCA consits of the territories of the former Captaincy General of Guatemala of New Spain, and was for a time part of Mexico. Political turmoil ensued in both Mexico and Central America, resulting in separation. Now we can reassert governorshp and integrate Central America once more.
As the preeminent heir to Spanish viceroyalties of the Americas, it is our right to integrate Cuba into our administration. Cuba shall be free!

At the time of its creation, this Colombia was the most prestigious country in Spanish America. John Quincy Adams, then Secretary of State and future president of the United States, claimed it to be one of the most powerful nations on the planet. This prestige, added to the personal stature of Simón Bolívar, resulted in independence movements in Cuba, the Dominican Republic, and Puerto Rico desiring to form an associated state with the republic.

Bolívar participated in the foundation of the first union of independent nations in Latin America, Gran Colombia, of which he was president from 1819 to 1830. Through further military campaigns, he ousted Spanish rulers from Ecuador, Peru, and Bolivia, the last of which was named after him. He was simultaneously president of Gran Colombia, Peru, and Bolivia, but soon after, his second-in-command, Antonio José de Sucre, was appointed president of Bolivia. Bolívar aimed at a strong and united Spanish America able to cope not only with the threats emanating from Spain and the European Holy Alliance but also with the emerging power of the United States. At the peak of his power, Bolívar ruled over a vast territory from the Argentine border to the Caribbean Sea.
Lately a new communal order of life in $COUNTRY$ has been established. Old political orders have been torn down, and a new founding of our communties has taken place.
Our claims on Congress Poland will be respected, the Congress of Vienna upheld, and our soverienty maintained.

The Easter Rising, also known as the Easter Rebellion, was an armed insurrection in Ireland during Easter Week in April 1916. The Rising was launched by Irish republicans against British rule in Ireland with the aim of establishing an independent Irish Republic while the United Kingdom was fighting the First World War. It was the most significant uprising in Ireland since the rebellion of 1798 and the first armed conflict of the Irish revolutionary period. Sixteen of the Rising's leaders were executed from May 1916, but the insurrection, the nature of the executions, and subsequent political developments ultimately contributed to an increase in popular support for Irish independence.
